msbt.message: I dig your house. It's real cozy and comfortableand it smells just like you!
Arranging furniture kinda feels like solving a puzzle, Maybe I'll memorize the way you decorated your place, then do the same thing with mine!
Your house feels warmer than mine.I mean temperature-warm, not "Aww, your place is warm 'n cozy." Even though it is. Warm 'n cozy.For serious though, your place is hot. What's the thermostat set to?

, you've got a really great place. You, uh, you mind if I crash here for a while?Just a couple weeks. <10_4 />You'll barely notice I'm here.A huh huh huh, I'm joking! Just pulling your leg!<10_4 /> It IS a really nice house, though.
Wow though, your place is so exciting! I want to make my house fun for my friends too.But where am I gonna fit a trampoline ball pit?
's place is so completely chill.It's so relaxing. If I had a snack and a cozy spot, I could take a nap.
's house has so much fancy furniture!Do you think ever worries about getting crumbs on any of it?
looks real chill right now. Maybe because we're here?
This room is soempty. I bet this is where you meditate, huh?That must be why you're always real chill.
Yodelay! Heeeee! Hooooooooooo!A huh huh huh, I love empty rooms. So echo-y!
If I were you Oh man. That'd be weird because I'd be you there, looking at me here and Wait. If I were youI'd fill this room with More stuff than it has now!<10_4 /> Yeah That'd be pretty cool.
